item.title: By: Lesley Close
item.dc:creator: Lesley Close
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2016/04/04/2018-swaledale-triennial-dates/#comment-7154">Pat Seeberger</a>.
Hi Pat, We will be publishing full details of the Triennial events in the November issue of <em>Hooking Matters</em>. Shortly afterwards, full information will appear on the TIGHR website. We look forward to meeting you and your husband in Swaledale - there will be events for non-participants too! Regards, Lesley
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Pat Seeberger.

Hi Pat,
We will be publishing full details of the Triennial events in the November issue of Hooking Matters. Shortly afterwards, full information will appear on the TIGHR website.
We look forward to meeting you and your husband in Swaledale – there will be events for non-participants too!
Regards,
Lesley

item.title: By: Lesley Close
item.dc:creator: Lesley Close
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2016/04/04/2018-swaledale-triennial-dates/#comment-6986">Deb Johnson</a>.
Hi Deb, Don't worry! I made a mistake when I said Easter 2017 - it should have been 2018, of course! Please feel free to contact the membership chair for further details about joining. Kind regards, Lesley
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Deb Johnson.

Hi Deb,
Don’t worry! I made a mistake when I said Easter 2017 – it should have been 2018, of course!
Please feel free to contact the membership chair for further details about joining.
Kind regards,
Lesley

item.title: By: Lesley Close
item.dc:creator: Lesley Close
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2016/04/04/2018-swaledale-triennial-dates/#comment-6948">Christine Smith</a>.
Hi Christine, If you join TIGHR now you will be entitled to come to the Triennial. We look forward to seeing you there! Lesley
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Christine Smith.

Hi Christine,
If you join TIGHR now you will be entitled to come to the Triennial. We look forward to seeing you there!
Lesley

item.title: By: Pat Seeberger
item.dc:creator: Pat Seeberger
item.description:
Hello
I just read about your 2018 triennial in the latest issue of Atha and would like to attend with my husband. Where would I find more information about this?
Thank you in advance,
Pat Seeberger Madison, VA
item.content:encoded:
Hello

I just read about your 2018 triennial in the latest issue of Atha and would like to attend with my husband. Where would I find more information about this?

Thank you in advance,

Pat Seeberger
Madison, VA

item.title: By: Deb Johnson
item.dc:creator: Deb Johnson
item.description: I have had much trouble getting membership form to download so membership can be sent in. I am from the US and have moved to Germany. I would like to attend your triennial meeting and need hotel and other information since it appears reservations should have been made by Easter??? 2017. I would appreciate help. Thank you.
item.content:encoded: I have had much trouble getting membership form to download so membership can be sent in. I am from the US and have moved to Germany. I would like to attend your triennial meeting and need hotel and other information since it appears reservations should have been made by Easter??? 2017. I would appreciate help. Thank you.

item.title: By: Christine Smith
item.dc:creator: Christine Smith
item.description: I am interested in attending the triennial in 2018. I am not presently a tighr member. If I join now, will that membership be good through the triennial dates, or will I need to join again next year?
item.content:encoded: I am interested in attending the triennial in 2018. I am not presently a tighr member. If I join now, will that membership be good through the triennial dates, or will I need to join again next year?

item.title: By: Lesley Close
item.dc:creator: Lesley Close
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2016/04/04/2018-swaledale-triennial-dates/#comment-6360">Rosario Villavicencio</a>.
Hi Roasario, As I explained in the email I sent via Ning, I am unable to edit any member's details. Only the member can do that. As a compromise, I have sent an invitation to join to your new address. I have also edited your message (above) to avoid the possibility of attracting 'spam' to your new address. With kind regards, Lesley
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Rosario Villavicencio.

Hi Roasario,
As I explained in the email I sent via Ning, I am unable to edit any member’s details. Only the member can do that.
As a compromise, I have sent an invitation to join to your new address. I have also edited your message (above) to avoid the possibility of attracting ‘spam’ to your new address.
With kind regards,
Lesley
